qolmat.imputations.rpca.pcp_rpca.PcpRPCA

class qolmat.imputations.rpca.pcp_rpca.PcpRPCA(n_rows: Optional[int] = None, mu: Optional[float] = None, lam: Optional[float] = None, maxIter: Optional[int] = 10000, tol: Optional[float] = 1e-06, verbose: bool = False)[source]

This class implements the basic RPCA decomposition using Alternating Lagrangian Multipliers.

Parameters
mu: Optional

parameter for the convergence and shrinkage operator

lam: Optional

penalizing parameter for the sparse matrix

References

Candès, Emmanuel J., et al. “Robust principal component analysis.” Journal of the ACM (JACM) 58.3 (2011): 1-37

Methods

fit_transform(signal[, return_basis])

Compute the RPCA decomposition of a matrix based on the PCP method

get_params()

Get parameters for this estimator.

set_params(**kargs)

Set the parameters of this estimator.

get_params_scale
